scripts.build: npm run -w client build && npm run -w server build && node scripts/copy-client-to-server.js
scripts.dev: concurrently -n client,server -c blue,green "npm run -w client dev" "npm run -w server dev"
scripts.postinstall: npm -w server run prisma:generate && npm -w client run build && node scripts/copy-client-to-server.js
